page_description.groupe_stage: Automated management of groups, rotations and internship assignments
page_description.historique_affectations: Manage and track all your training internships
page_description.utilisateur: Manage all Users centrally (add, modify, delete).
page_description.stagiaire: Track interns with an overview of their assignments.
page_description.chercheur: Track researchers with an overview of their assignments.
page_description.programme_formation: Create, manage and organize training programs to meet strategic and operational needs.
page_description.theme_formation: Organize themes related to each training.
page_description.lieu_formation: Manage different training locations by cohort.
page_description.tache_formation: Manage different tasks to be performed during training.
page_description.tache_executee: Manage execution of your various tasks.
page_description.objectif_theme: Define educational objectives for each training theme.
page_description.formateur: Manage different trainers, both internal and external.
page_description.suivi_budgetaire: Analyze planned and actual expenses for each training.
page_description.budget_formation: Develop and track budgets allocated to your trainings.
page_description.rapport_formation: View detailed reports on planned and completed trainings.
page_description.support_formation: Store and share materials associated with each training.
page_description.carnet_stage: Record interns' daily tasks, manage absences and generate internship logbooks.
page_description.rapport_stage: Get a complete analytical view of interns and their internships, including distribution by supervisor.
page_description.rapport_stage_recherche: Get a complete analytical view of researchers and their research periods, including distribution by supervisor.
page_description.nouvelle_competence: Indicate new skills you wish to acquire.
page_description.type_echelle_reponse: Define and organize scale types used in evaluations.
page_description.echelle_reponse: Configure rating scales for better interpretation of responses.
page_description.evaluation_a_chaud: Create and manage post-training hot evaluations.
page_description.evaluation_a_chaud_evaluer: View available hot evaluations and track your progress.
page_description.evaluation_a_chaud_effectuer: Fill out the form to evaluate the training you attended.
